name: Temple Fall
description:
You and your opponent are the hearts of men who have been sacrificed by the Aztecs. In a last attempt to stay alive, one of you must fall down the temple's flight of steps toward the bottom, keeping your blood pumping, and avoiding any obstacles in your way!

Credits:

James Brownlee - Coding/Design

Sean Browning - Art/Design

Richard Lord - Art

soundbible.com - SFX

Unity Standard Assets
